summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3228 for the improvement of North and West 80th Street, from Greenwood Avenue to 8th Avenue Northwest, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 40031, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
